Howdy! I am currently lecturing the Intermediate Macroeconomics for undergraduate students at the School of Agricultural Economics and Rural Development, Renmin University of China. Materials for the class will be posted here (occasionally). 

If you have any questions, feel free to contact me via `dayabin@ruc.edu.cn`.


### Syllabus

- Syllabus in Chinese can be found [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1223v4L35Ri4jJkv7X_zxiCvwaWnWHyhD/view?usp=sharing).
